actions.text: Amendment SA 3115, under the order of 2/1/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 11.
Amendment SA 3115 proposed by Senator Franken to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3115 proposed by Senator Franken to Amendment SA 2953.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3115, under the order of 2/1/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 11.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3115, under the order of 2/1/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 11.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To establish a Federal energy efficiency resource standard for electricity and natural gas suppliers.
